name: mobility-toolbox-js
description: Toolbox for JavaScript applications in the domains of mobility and logistics.

scripts.build:tsc: rm -rf build && yarn tsc && cp package.json build/ && cp README.md build/ && cp LICENSE build/  && cp -R src/types build/ && find build -type f -name '*.test.*' -delete
scripts.cy:test:chrome: yarn build && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --browser chrome'
scripts.cy:test:edge: yarn build && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --browser edge'
scripts.cy:test:firefox: yarn build && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 'cypress run --browser firefox'
scripts.doc: yarn build && yarn apidoc && cd doc && rm -rf node_modules/mobility-toolbox-js && yarn install --force && yarn build
scripts.doc:dev: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn apidoc && yarn doc:dev:examples
scripts.doc:dev:examples: yarn clean && yarn build && cd doc && rm -rf node_modules/mobility-toolbox-js && yarn install --force && yarn dev
scripts.esbuild:all: esbuild src/index.js src/**/*.js src/**/*.ts src/**/**/*.js src/**/**/*.ts --target=chrome100 --outdir=build/ --loader:.js=jsx
scripts.format: prettier --write 'src/**/*.js' 'src/**/*.ts'  'src/**/*.test.js' && eslint src/**/*.js src/**/*.test.js src/**/*.ts --fix && stylelint 'src/**/*.css' 'src/**/*.scss' --fix --allow-empty-input
scripts.lint: eslint src/**/*.js src/**/*.ts && stylelint src/**/*.css src/**/*.scss --allow-empty-input
scripts.publish:beta: HUSKY=0 yarn release -- --prerelease beta --skip.changelog  && yarn run build && cd build && HUSKY=0 yarn publish --tag beta && git push origin HEAD && git push --tags
scripts.publish:public: yarn release  && yarn run build && cd build && HUSKY=0 yarn publish && git push origin HEAD && git push --tags
scripts.start: yarn doc && cd doc && yarn start
scripts.start:examples: cd doc && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.types:backend: yarn types:stops && yarn types:routing && yarn types:moco
